marklogic.body: Well again some Media stations have highlighted the back of Zimmermans head and you can see what looks like a cutt or gash. and as far as a broken nose, you could break a nose and not Bleed and not see bruises for 24 hours... so your remarks are way Off.......... Bottom line though is Zimmerman should be behind bars, even if Trayvon jumped him as he said , it was only because Trayvon was trying to stand his ground against a weirdo with a gun.... Zimmerman was told not to pursue and in doing so he ended a young mans life with his aggression.Â
